Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Vincennes, Summit, Halsted and 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Vincennes, Summit, Halsted and 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Vincennes.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
